md:
giải nghĩa từ "ad" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Ad** (prefix)

* Meaning: towards, near, or in addition to
* Part of speech: prefix
* Example sentence: "The ad hoc committee was formed to address the crisis."
* Related words: adjoin, adjacent, adumbrate

**Ad** (abbreviation)

* Meaning: advertisement
* Part of speech: abbreviation
* Example sentence: "The company placed an ad in the newspaper to promote their new product."
* Related words: advertise, advertiser, advertising

**Ad** (Latin)

* Meaning: to, towards
* Part of speech: preposition
* Example sentence: "The Latin phrase 'ad astra' means 'to the stars'."
* Related words: ad infinitum, ad hoc, ad libitum
html:
giải nghĩa từ "ad" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

Ad (prefix)

  • Meaning: towards, near, or in addition to
  • Part of speech: prefix
  • Example sentence: "The ad hoc committee was formed to address the crisis."
  • Related words: adjoin, adjacent, adumbrate

Ad (abbreviation)

  • Meaning: advertisement
  • Part of speech: abbreviation
  • Example sentence: "The company placed an ad in the newspaper to promote their new product."
  • Related words: advertise, advertiser, advertising

Ad (Latin)

  • Meaning: to, towards
  • Part of speech: preposition
  • Example sentence: "The Latin phrase 'ad astra' means 'to the stars'."
  • Related words: ad infinitum, ad hoc, ad libitum
